content.raw:
In my overnight testing, the UNIT_ImagesView_TEST is now failing about 1/3 of the time since we merged pull request #921. Last night it failed 8/25 times:

 * 2 timeouts
 * 1 unknown exception
 * 5 glibc `double free or corruption` errors, 2 of which gave memory map and backtraces

content.html:
In my overnight testing, the UNIT_ImagesView_TEST is now failing about 1/3 of the time since we merged pull request #921. Last night it failed 8/25 times:

  • 2 timeouts
  • 1 unknown exception
  • 5 glibc double free or corruption errors, 2 of which gave memory map and backtraces

Backtrace 1
